description: [Status: stable] [Name: pytest-use-fixtures-without-parameters] [Message: Useless pytest.mark.usefixtures without parameters] What it does Checks for @pytest.mark.usefixtures() decorators that aren't passed any arguments. Why is this bad? A @pytest.mark.usefixtures() decorator that isn't passed any arguments is useless and should be removed. Example import pytest @pytest.mark.usefixtures() def test_something(): ... Use instead: def test_something(): ...
